question_text: What is one reason some laptops place their built-in camera on the bottom bezel of the display?
answer_options: To reduce signal interference from wireless antennas
To make the bezel thinner on top for design purposes
correct_answer: To make the bezel thinner on top for design purposes
explanation: Some laptops use bottom bezel cameras to allow for ultra-thin top bezels, though this sacrifices optimal camera angles.
